post.author: kookoopapa
post.body:
I'm glad to find the exporter to md5. However, my model still cannot export to md5 and I try to find and read through the forum.

I use 3ds Max 7, the problem is that cannot export md5 if my model using biped although using all convertor, exporter.

anyone can provide me any tutorial or any information

thanks in advance

post.author: Lumpengnom
post.body:
If nothing else works perhaps the following will help. Note that i haven´t tried this myself:
You can turn your Biped into normal animated bones by exporting to fbx and importing again. There´s a tutorial in the Max online reference on how to do this exactly. It´s called "Creating Animated Bones with Bipeds".
